overview:
James R.B. Vertisan is the founder of Executive Caddie, Vertisan Inc, and Inadon Corporation, as well as the author of the â€œeBusiness Success Kitâ€ and other publications. He has over 20 years of experience as a developer, consultant, and corporate leader. He has pioneered numerous successful ecommerce ventures with both Fortune 500 companies and Internet startups. Besides working with outside organizations, he was the architect and entrepreneurial vision behind the Executive Caddie and TandemSkydive.com.

Mr. Vertisan has appeared repeatedly on radio and television and is recognized as in industry expert in the Internet field. He conducted seminars across the country on his eBusiness success methodology.

Mr. Vertisan has also been a teacher and corporate trainer specializing in SQL database architecture and T-SQL programming.
